title: JSON schema for nls in package View Exports SVG extension for Visual Studio Code

extension.description.default: ‚ú® 'View Exports SVG' is a Visual Studio Code extension designed to streamline the process of accessing and utilizing SVG icons. With this extension, you can effortlessly explore and search for SVG icons within your project, simplifying the task of finding and integrating them into your project.

extension.commands.showMenu.title.description: The title of the command to show the menu

extension.config.assetsPath.title.description: The title of the configuration to store the paths of analyzed files that have SVG icons

extension.config.assetsPath.description.description: The description of the configuration to store the paths of analyzed files that have SVG icons
extension.config.assetsPath.description.default: An array to store the paths of analyzed files that have SVG icons. This allows for quick access to them from the webview, serving as shortcuts.

extension.config.ignoreDirectories.title.description: The title of the configuration to store the pattern of directories to ignore when analyzing files for SVG icons

extension.config.ignoreDirectories.descr.description: The description of the configuration to store the pattern of directories to ignore when analyzing files for SVG icons
extension.config.ignoreDirectories.descr.default:
An array to store the pattern of directories to ignore when analyzing files for SVG icons.
Default:
**/.git
**/.github
**/.husky
**/.idea
**/.idx
**/.vscode*
**/build
**/coverage
**/dist
**/node_modules
**/out

extension.config.lastScanDate.title.description: The title of the configuration to store the date of the last scan of the workspace for SVG icons

extension.config.lastScanDate.descriptio.description: The description of the configuration to store the date of the last scan of the workspace for SVG icons
extension.config.lastScanDate.descriptio.default: The date of the last scan of the workspace for SVG icons.

extension.config.defaultIconProperties.t.description: The title of the configuration to store the default properties to apply to SVG icons

extension.config.defaultIconProperties.d.description: The description of the configuration to store the default properties to apply to SVG icons
extension.config.defaultIconProperties.d.default: Default properties to apply to SVG icons when they do not have a property defined or when the extension does not find it.

extension.config.showNotExportedIcons.ti.description: The title of the configuration to indicate whether or not to show icons that are not being exported

extension.config.showNotExportedIcons.de.description: The description of the configuration to indicate whether or not to show icons that are not being exported
extension.config.showNotExportedIcons.de.default: Indicates whether or not to show icons that are not being exported.

extension.config.groupPatterns.title.description: The title of the configuration to store an array of patterns to group icon files

extension.config.groupPatterns.descripti.description: The description of the configuration to store an array of patterns to group icon files
extension.config.groupPatterns.descripti.default:
An array of patterns to group icon files. Each pattern requires an 'item' (the pattern) and a 'value (the group name).
Example:
| item | value |
| --- | --- |
| ** | All Icons |
| **/Flag* | Flags |
| **/Symbol*.{js, jsx} | Symbols |

extension.config.recentIcons.showIcons.t.description: The title of the configuration to indicate whether or not to show recent icons

extension.config.recentIcons.showIcons.d.description: The description of the configuration to indicate whether or not to show recent icons
extension.config.recentIcons.showIcons.d.default: Indicates whether or not to show the most recently accessed icons.

extension.config.recentIcons.limitShowIc.description: The title of the configuration to store the limit of recent icons to show
The description of the configuration to store the limit of recent icons to show
extension.config.recentIcons.limitShowIc.default: The maximum number of recent icons to show.
